item.title: arXiv insanity - Part 0 - Setup all the things!
item.description: Setup! Introduction Link to heading TBD Set up the Compute Engine instance Link to heading When setting up a virtual machine, I choose Ubuntu 22.04.2 LTS as the operative system. First, I install a set of packages which are required by pyenv for building Python: sudo apt update sudo apt --assume-yes install build-essential libssl-dev zlib1g-dev \ libbz2-dev libreadline-dev libsqlite3-dev curl \ libncursesw5-dev xz-utils tk-dev libxml2-dev \ libxmlsec1-dev libffi-dev liblzma-dev Install pyenv with the pyenv installer:
